markdownRemark.html:
Lv 2. 귤 고르기

문제

풀이

function solution(k, tangerine) {
  const result = {};

  tangerine.forEach((n) => {
    result[n] = ++result[n] || 1;
  });
  const kind = Object.values(result).sort((a, b) => b - a);

  let sum = 0;
  let answer = 0;

  for (let num of kind) {
    answer++;
    sum += num;
    if (sum >= k) break;
  }

  return answer;
}```
